testcaseName: Patient is 5 years old and was administered Moderna as first dose of Covid-19 vaccine.
generalDescription: This test case describes when a 5 year old child is administered Moderna as the first dose of the Covid-19 vaccine,  that the dose is considered valid, and a second dose should be forecasted.
reasonForChange:
v4.21 Updated past due date to 8 weeks per 02/22/22 Clinical Considerations guidelines
v4.14 Updated the test case based on new updated ACIP Guideline Recommendations (11/3/2021).  Updated test case name, age, and description from 12 to 5 years. Updated CVX Code to 218.
